basics.name: Sebastian Messier
basics.label: Solutions Architect
basics.summary: I establish deep connections with users, work effectively with teams, and build things people need.

work.name: AirMed
work.summary: Transitioned from CTO to advisor role. I assist with technical hiring and R&D.

work.name: AirMed
work.summary: As a sufferer of sleep apnea, I quickly realized the CPAP purchasing experience was a nightmare. I validated the problem via patient interviews and built the technology to streamline the CPAP purchase experience. Brought on an amazing CEO and raised 3M in seed funding.
highlights: Mocked up, architected, and shipped our products from scratch.
Hired a distributed team of engineers to help create our products.
Brought company to 18k MRR over the course of a year.
Raised 3m in seed funding (Bling Capital, Apollo Projects, Justin Kan).

work.name: Capital One
work.summary: I build tech for the in-person customer experience. This entails delivering enhancements and features for our customer servicing iPad app, and building tools to help branch associates do their job.
highlights: Established code standards & best practices within my organization.
Architected & built customer queue, user feedback collection, and push notifications api.
Quickly pivoted to contact-less servicing for COVID-19.

work.name: flexEngage
work.summary: A YC-backed digital receipts startup. Lots of Java, Docker, Spring Boot, AWS, HTML Email Templates, and integrations support.
highlights: Joined during period of hyper-growth. On boarded Under Armor, Michael Kors, and Grupo Exito (Amazon of South America)
Design, implement, test, and shipped micro-services written in Java/Spring, Docker, and deployed on AWS.
Lead regular meetings to address and triage issues faced by other teams.

work.name: Apple
work.summary: Intern at Apple's hardware diagnostics department. Helped curb fraud by detecting fabricated phones via hardware diagnostic tests.
highlights: Wrote diagnostics suites for iPhone hardware in Matlab, Lua, and Objective-C.
Built data collection tool to gather and organize test results at scale.
Built and presented optical image stabilization diagnostic proof of concept.
